Water
metadata.title: Water in northern Alberta

Water in Northern Alberta (1987 : Grande Prairie)
metadata.publisher: Peace River, Alta. : Northern Alberta Development Council
metadata.description: [v.1]. Water in northern Alberta, conference report Grande Prairie, November 4-6, 1987.--[v.2]. Water in northern Alberta, technical report, [prepared by] DPA Group in association with W-E-R Engineering Ltd. and Environmental Management Associates

Report which was used as a resource document by participants at the conference held November, 1987. Key issues and preliminary suggested actions, as identified and put forward by northern residents, are described to give a basis and starting point for deliberation at the conference. Background information includes historical background, roles of government agencies, and relevant technical information
